Welcome to "what i read". Please note that this is a project still under active development. This application allows you to input books (either by scanning a barcode, or entering their 13-digit ISBN). You will be notified if you read the book before. Additionally, you browse through the books you've already marked as read. We hope you will enjoy this application.

This application is free software. You can retrieve the source code and licence at https://github.com/Norwae/what-i-read.

The ISBN metadata lookup is powered by Google Books.
